wblut.hemesh

Class HEC_Prism

  • java.lang.Object
    • wblut.hemesh.HEC_Creator
      • wblut.hemesh.HEC_Prism

  • public class HEC_Prism
extends HEC_Creator
    The Class HEC_Prism.
    Author:
    Frederik Vanhoutte, W:Blut Creates a rectangular prism. If a thickness is specified the result is a solid, otherwise it's a surface, a regular polygon.

    • Field Summary
